title: Sweeet Toooth!: Eat Dessert 1st
name: Sweeet Toooth!: Eat Dessert 1st
description:
A Map by Madamegonzaga

Here eez where wee veal poot ze best places tou eat ze iced creams toadgezzle.

properties.name: Bagdad Cafe, 2295 Market Street, San Francisco CA
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  Whether you\'re drunk or not, their poostrami sammiches ar ze beast in ze City! Ax fur ze exxxtra dose ov Russian dressing und let ze games begin!

properties.name: Bombay Ice Creamery
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing  552 Valencia St, San Francisco, CA Ice-cream parlor, Indian boutique, sari shop. Buy a do-it-yourself henna tattoo kit!

properties.name: Boulange de Polk
properties.description: Posted by Ludmilla 2308 Polk St, San Francisco, CAyummy french pastries, coffee in bowls, great people watching!

properties.name: Ceasar Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  208 Valencia Street, San Francisco CA Good Morning, Glory! Some of the good folks of Ceasar Cafe: Edith, The Great Mario, and Joan. _____________________ If you\'ve lived in the City for awhile, you\'ve probably enjoyed one of Joan and Sam\'s fine homey coffee shops. They were on Valencia near New College at one time and that\'s where I first came to depend on them for my morning jolt. Now they\'re further up Valencia, still serving up a decent meal for a fair price--in fact the menu is pretty robust and even tastier these days. I was impressed by the generous girth of my breakfast crepe and would have happily shared halfsies with a friend. Salads, bagels, sandwiches, caffeine, whatever keeps ya going, get it here. ___________ Open Monday through Friday 6:30AM-10PM, Saturday 8AM-10PM, Sunday 8AM-8PM (grill closes at 7PM on Sundays) 415.621.3800

properties.name: Charles Chocolates Test Store
properties.description: Posted by Baostar3527 California Street, San Francisco, CA 94118A temporary Laurel Heights confectionery.

properties.name: Cremerie François ( Sint-Niklaas, BE )
properties.description: Posted by Dsudorioni scream you scream we all scream for ze icecream!

properties.name: Jardinière
properties.description: Posted by System 300 Grove Street, San Francisco, CA, 94102Jardinière 415-861-5555

properties.name: Joe's Ice Cream
properties.description: Posted by System  5351 Geary Boulevard, San Francisco, CA, 94121Joe\'s Ice Cream 415415-751387-19506418

properties.name: Luciano ov Schroeder's Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   240 Front Street, San Francisco CAOx Tail eez lyke crack! Goot strawlberrry desserties, tooo. But ze veddy beast ting abooot Schroeder\'s eez ze dapper handsome gentleman in ze suit, Luciano. Tell heem ze Madame sent aryooooo! Might I suggest ze osso bucco? Tummy fluff! Injoy ze Fine Bavarian Food wifout ze exorbitant airfare!

properties.name: Luna Park
properties.description: Posted by Tanabutler  694 Valencia Street, San Francisco, CA, 94110Luna Park 415-553-8584

properties.name: Magnolia Brewpub
properties.description: Posted by Garlynn haight st and masonic st, san francisco, caThe only brewpub in the Upper Haight, Magnolia has been around for a while and is a local favorite. Unfortunately for me, this means that it always seems to be totally packed whenever I try to go there...

properties.name: Mitchell's Ice Cream
properties.description: Posted by Jimyoung 688 San Jose Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94110Mitchell\'s Ice Cream 415-648-2300

properties.name: Naughty Customers Expect to be Seated at Empty Tables!
properties.description: Posted by Wendolyne  399 Grove Street, San Francisco, CA, 94102We arrived between breakfast and lunch. The stoic host resolutely refused to allow us to be seated until each and every table was emptied from breakfast and set for lunch. He cared not a whit that I was feeling faint, nor did he shed a tear that the opera rehearsal would begin soon. He begrudgingly suggested waiting at the bar where the only possibly available seating was laden with coats of those perched on nearby stools. I guess I could have dealt with all o\'dat, but the last straw was when we were finally seated (much to the poor host\'s chagrin, I imagine) and the waitress asked if we\'d like bottled water or if tap water would be sufficient. I really hate how snooty restaurants present this choice by intimating that if you\'re a cheap bastard who doesn\'t care about your health, well then, by all means--go with the tap water. Sure, say I\'m being too harsh, but when kindly asked if we could just simply have a seat at a table and hold off on ordering until they were ready for lunch, the host maintained that we\'d simply have to wait. So we stood and waited like good citizens. Had I not had an opera engagement and been in need of nourishment beforehand, I\'d have marched out, but as it was with being rushed, feeling faint, and waiting for a friend I was caught like a rat in a trap. As it is, Citizen Cake is banished from my kingdom. I will admit to enjoying the marshmallow in my mocha, but no more than that. Fancy treats aren\'t worth putting up with rude hosts, and there are far too many delicacies beckoning from elsewhere for my attentions. Disclaimer: A delightful old comrade of mine once worked here and maybe still does. I know that *she* would never treat a chocolate-loving fellow citizen in this manner...so my apologies to those who don\'t harsh the mellow who may be Citizen Cake proles. Rosebud!

properties.name: Patricia und Baristas ov Martha & Bros. Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  3868 24th Street, San Francisco CA Beastsides ze best mocha on ice in ze weirld, Patricia und her gang ov baristas at Martha\'s in Noe Valley also hav ze bestest smiles in ze weirld! Arooooooooooousing! Free smile in every cup! Beans, caffeine dreenkies, pastries, outdoor seatings, fresh fruits in nicey beeg cups, stuffed muffins, coookies, und community. Now zat\'s wot wot ze Mad Ham lykes in ze caffffeeeeine shoppe. Openeded 5:30 am (KAK!) till 8:00 pm weekdays, und 6:00 am to 7:00 pm on ze weekends. 415.641.4433,

properties.name: Pedro ov Brazil Fresh Squeeze Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  2161 University Avenue, Berkeley, CA Pedro\'s meats ar ze best in all ze Land! Tri-tip! I fluff gettinks ze snakkings und chatties as I wait in line. Mango Smoooooothies! Yip! Yip! Transport yore elf tou meatweirld wif ze mouth-watering goodness ov melt-in-ze-mouth meats. Tastiest meats in ze Bay Area. I ham jonesin\'! Aryooo hear meee? Jonesin\'! for more ov ze saucy goodness. Eevin ze veggies were choice.

properties.name: Quetzal ( Gent, BE )
properties.description: Posted by Dsudorionchocolate chocolate and chocolate!!

properties.name: Sami Sunchild ov San Francisco's Red Victorian Bed, Breakfast & Peace Arts Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga    1665 Haight Street, San Francisco CA Sami Sunchild eez not ze flower chylde mourning ze end ov ze Summer ov Fluff, shee eez ze visionary hoo wants tou lead ze weirld to peace through tourism und travel ov each nation\'s peoples. Veeziting herr B&B eez lyke having ze dinings wif your favrit auntie. Shee veal poot aryooo to work if help eez needed und shee veal sit und chat if shee hath ze moment. Butt shee alvays vants tou ensure your comfort und whilst shee eez doing zat she veal plant ze seeds ov love und peace inside aryooo wifout your even noticing until later. Get a dose ov Sami next time aryooo veezit ze Haight. ZE TOMATOE PIE EEZ TOU DYE FUR!!!!!!!!!! Best. Pie. Ever. Paws down.

properties.name: St. Francis Fountain
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 2801 24th Street, San Francisco CA 94110Old-timey iced creams parlour und ze soda fountain wif ze pwitty und nicey waitstaffinings. Goose get some iced cremes!

properties.name: Sweet Inspirations
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga2239 Market Street, San Francisco CAWhen ze Princess Cake eez in season, aryoooo veal be smitten. Otterwise, stixxx wif ze banana creme pie und beeg-ass mocha.

properties.name: Tartine
properties.description: Posted by Transfairusa fair trade

properties.name: Walker's Pie Shoppe
properties.description: Posted by Queenie617 1491 Solano Ave, Albany, CA 94706A small unasuming diner with the best pie in the Bay Area! Nice large breakfasts too. But the PIE is DIVINE!
